body:
Tooltips added to:
- Weather widget
- Music widget
- Note widget

Not sure if the favorites and calendar widgets needs tooltips.

3 new strings added for the weather widgets.

I also changed some code in the color palette editor and on toolbars to reuse the same tooltip code which accidentaly fixed a bug where if you opened a tooltip on a toolbar, after tooltip close, the keyboard would reopen and block the component in view.
